Just click the magnet link and your torrent will download the same way.  You might have to change the preferences on whatever torrent client you have installed to make it accept magnet URIs, but I have bittorrent and it's working fine.

Solution:

1) Right click "Get this torrent" & click "copy link address"
2) Open BitTorrent
3) File -> Add Torrent from URL
4) Paste
5) Done

Might be slightly different if you're not using BitTorrent but this worked for me. Downloaded White Collar in a little over the time it took to type this.
